law.catch_line: Casualty contracts subject to general provisions.
law.text: All contracts of casualty insurance covering subjects of insurance resident, located or to be performed in this state are subject to the applicable provisions of this subtitle, Subtitle 14, and to other applicable provisions of this code.
law.history: Created 1970 Ky. Acts ch. 301, subtit. 20, sec. 1, effective June 18, 1970.
